lines.text:
[seeing one fashion called "The Hunt"]
I think I'd look stunning in that riding habit.

[whispers to Moe]
I think there'd be trouble figuring out which one was the horse.

[once told they inherited their uncle's gown shop]
Water... give me water.
[a car drives by and splashes all three of them]
Water you had to have, eh?
Are you sure this work will be in competent hands?

[Moe pinches Larry's nose with scissors]
He looks like a V-8.

[after having nails pulled out of his rear end]
You must have left some of them in me.
Just a few little ones, you need some iron.
This idea's been in my head since I was 10 years old.
Oh, sorta aged in the wood.
